attributes.action: We want to see Age 25+ free courses, Sign now and stop them being scrapped
attributes.additional_details: We want the UK government to help adults 25+ with free educational courses, Its unfair that people under the age of 25 are entitled to a good choice of free courses at thier local collage, but if you over 25 you get a small amount free - English and Maths, young people who have just come out of school get a much bigger range of free courses than anyone over 25, should this be the case? most under 25 go to a job with recent qualifications, over 25 and they are seen as old and not fresh!! GIVE 25+ THE SAME ALLOWANCES
